h2Text: Count words and characters in documents
metaTitle: Word Counter | Online and Free | Aspose.PDF
mainText: Word Counter is a web service that allows you to count words and letters in your text. Word counter calculates the words and letters in the text immediately with your browser. This is useful if you have commissioned or produced a text. And it doesn't limited on plain text. Word counter also handles practically all kinds of document formats, including images. In total, it supports 162 popular file formats. For the various popular formats from Pdf, DOCX, XSLX, PPTX family we use our unique algorithm, which will help to find text in the most various sections of the document. The ability to count the number of words and letters on a single page adds even more flexibility. We do not store your documents and do not transfer them to third parties. Your documents are completely safe and an easy way to calculate words and chars in document online for free.
